effect.black_white: Heals the user for half its max HP.
effect.black_2_white_2: Heals the user for half its max HP.

short_effect.black_white: Heals the user by half its max HP.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Heals the user by half its max HP.

flavor_text.black_white: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.
